snippet: With the return of the show hosted by Donald Trump, 8 of the 19 hours NBC schedules with original programs will be filled with reality shows.
abstract: With the return of the show hosted by Donald Trump, 8 of the 19 hours NBC schedules with original programs will be filled with reality shows.
lead_paragraph: Looking to keep a veteran reality format alive, NBC's "Celebrity Apprentice" announced a cast for the coming series that is heavier on familiar faces than in recent seasons - as well as funny ones.

headline.main: 'Celebrity Apprentice' Goes Higher Profile as NBC Bets Heavy on Reality TV
